metadata.Title: CVE-2011-3825 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Zend Framework 1.11.3 in Zend Server CE 5.1.0 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via a direct request to a .php file, which reveals the installation path in an error message, as demonstrated by Validate.php and certain other files.

notes.Note: ebarretto> installation path is known info in debian pkg

criterions.comment: zend-framework: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'see notes').
